title: @SexP3ke "Appreciation Thread"
body:
Hey Adam,


I would like to make this thread to say thanks for helping me become a better League of Legends player. and helping advance in Solo Q.

Today I just made my second pentakill in ranked this time with Akali{{champion:84}}  (http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/72827938/200279166?tab=overview) I got a Mejai's fully stacked :D and of course my first pentakill with ~~Tryndamere ~~ WINDAMERE AKA TRYNDABOSS!  {{champion:23}} and last but not least your help with ~~Kassadin~~ KASSAWIN!{{champion:38}}  specifically about getting Seraphs it has been instrumental to even more success with him I can now defeat even AD champs such as Riven's Yasuo's and Talon's with him. Thank you so much man I really appreciate it. :)

replies.body:
I remember how he was so obsessed with the ahem, poems he wrote up (but yer let's not add any more than this).

But other than that, him good man.
Oh, you remember that....I got banned for it. But for the people who remember, the vault is there forever to be read.
If anyone loses to a Kassadin as Riven, Yasuo and especially Talon, they should go back to bot games.

Not if the Kassadin player knows how to use minion aggro and starts cloth 5 plus flat health seals ,

and Also if the Kassadin player listens to Problematic Troll/Psyper about how riven sucks vs anyone vs a poke and self peel. All I did in the Yasuo match up was take Q at level one poke him to destroy his sheild and then take W at 2 and max E first and when Yasuo dashes to you W and E him. and same thing with Riven really get them to attack you in your own minion waves let the minions butcher them and then get Seekers and then try and roam bot ..... too ez

While I agree that Riven sucks against poke and self peeling champions with escapes, Kassadin can't poke hard enough before 6. Unlike top lane Quinn which rustles my jimmies to the max every time.  Also depends if Riven is running CDR glyphs instead of MR. A neat way to win lanes is to wait for minions to start fighting each other, kill all minions except one hence pushing it and as soon as the enemy laner goes in for a CS, kill the last enemy minion making your wave focus the enemy laner, you go in to do your CC (Riven's stun in this scenario) and you get a lot of damage on the enemy. This is mostly done at top lane.

For Talon, Kassadin is easy to kill pre 6. What makes it hard for Kassadin to fight back is that he's melee. Minion aggro doesn't put out a lot here unlike against ranged APCs when playing as Talon. Starting cloth against Talon has its cons and pros. Con being you probably can't kill him/you do less damage. Pro being you're more resistant and can build a quicker Seeker. If both players are equal in skill, Talon should win. Flat health seals aren't that good against Talon, I remember reading somewhere that flat hp seals get outdone by armour at level 3 (not sure) or something. As a mid laner against Talon, you always want armour seals. 

Yasuo is a little different, he has a weakish early game so harassing him is fairly easy.  If he tries to get behind your minions and do a Talon procedure, he can't because he doesn't do enough damage early on to go that ham. Skill match up I believe.
Please don't play Akali anymore, she's my waifu.
